outputSpeech.ssml:
<speak> These are the top matches from Ask by Legal Shield.  Number 1: Will the mediator determine what is fair or appropriate in our case?

; Number 2: On what basis will a physician determine that I am incapable of making mental and physical health care decisions?

; Number 3: What are the disadvantages of a living will?

;You can tell me a number for more information. For example open number one.  </speak>
